page.title: 03 HOMELIFE IN KENNINGTON-1
page.content: On Saturday l wake up between 8.00 and 8.30am and l read my book for an hour. Then l get up, get on my jeans and jumper and go downstaris for breakfast, which consists of Cornflake s, a piece of toast, which we cook under the grill and either lemonade or Cola for a drink. My brothers have nearly the same for breakfast and my Mum and dad have an egg and some toast. Afterwards l have my wash and go into the front room to watch the television until my Dad is ready to take me to town. When l go to town with my dad or my whole family, we first go to the market. When we leave the market we go to Ashford Library so l can change my books and then we go to the big Tescos. We park in the car park and we buy all the necessary things for a week, like sugar, butter, eggs and bread.
